959430.name: ASH OF WAR™ - Operation Sundown
959430.description:
Two-Way Ltd. team is glad to announce the next DLC for ASH OF WAR™.

Operation Sundown


The story of Joe is not yet over. See the changes of Joe, see the fate of the ASH squad, what happens next.
Do you believe in luck?

DLC adds extra episodes which describes circumstances after the chase fall.
You will also meet new gameplay mechanics.

As a reminder,
ASH OF WAR™ - Operation Sundown is a FREE DLC for the owners of original ASH OF WAR™ game.
959430.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 意大利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
